title: NFL to reevaluate Rooney Rule: 'More work to do'

sources.name: ESPN NFL
sources.title: NFL to reevaluate Rooney Rule: 'More work to do'
sources.description: NFL commissioner Roger Goodell said Monday that the league will take a closer a look at the Rooney Rule and all that it encompasses after an offseason hiring cycle that saw only one of 10 head-coaching jobs go to a minority candidate.
